answers.answer:
Present perfect adalah tenses yang menyatakan bahwa kejadian sudah dilakukan.
Rumus : S + Have/Has(Auxiliary) + V3
Misal : I have done my homework
Unsur : I = Subject
Have = Aux/Have/Has
Done = V3
Homework = Object
Umumnya ditambahkan kata Since + Time
Jadi : I have done my homework since this morning

present perfect itu berhubungan dengan kejadian yang sudah selesai. kata kuncinya sih ada kata "sudah", "baru saja", dsb.

misalkan "saya sudah mengerjakan PR", atau i have done my homework

related_questions.question:
Ubahlah menjadi indirect speech!    1. Kiki said '' What's will you buy in the mall?''
2. Mrs. Maria said '' Can you speak englsh well?''
3. Yuda said Tika '' Are you from Surabaya?''

answers.answer:
kalau kalimatnya pertanyaan sebaiknya jangan pakai 'said' tapi pakai 'asked (verb 2 dari ask)', jadinya...
1. Kiki asked me what would I buy in the mall : menggunakan me karena menceritakan kembali
2. Mrs. Maria asked me if I could speak English very well : menggunakan me karena menceritakan kembali
3. Yuda asked Tika if was she from Surabaya : menggunakan she karena menceritakan kembali

semoga membantu :)

1. kiki asked me what would i buy in the mall.
2. Mrs. Maria asked me can i speak English well
3. Yuda asked Tika was she from Surabaya

related_questions.question:
Ubah kalimat tersebut ke dalam bentuk pasif    1. It is said that many people are homeless after floods
2. People say that Arthur is very rich
3. People say that he has 22 children

answers.answer:
1. It is said that many people are homeless after floods
-- ini udah pasif ya? 
Many people are homeless due to flood, it is said by the newspaper

2. People say that Arthur is very rich
Arthur is very rich, is said by people

3. People say that he has 22 children 
he has 22 children, is said by people

            3. Age (New,old, ...)
            4. Nose (sweet, smelling, ...)

Tolong kerjasamanya Friend's.. thanks so'much!

answers.answer:
Skin = cool, hot, soft, dirty, clean, rude, ugly, beautiful
Place : in, on, at, beside, behind, in front, between.
Age : old, young, new,

related_questions.question: Their motivation...............(improve) if they..........................(kick) a goal during the first half

answers.answer:
their motivation increases when the kick goal during the first half

related_questions.question: Pengertian dan contoh adverb of frequency

answers.answer: adverb yang menggambarkan frekuensi seseorang melakukan suatu pekerjaan, misalnya setiap hari, atau beberapa kali dalam 1 bulan
pengertian : kata keterangan yang menyatakan seberapa sering suatu kegiatan yang dilakukan.

answers.answer: 2. Mr. Kukuh and his family will go to Bali and Lombok if they have a long holiday this year

related_questions.question: Tolong describe dengan tema "my beloved home"

answers.answer: I live in an ordinary house, but I always feel that I belong here for no reason. My house really cozy, it has 4 rooms with AC inside, 1 kitchen, 3 bathrooms, 1 livingrooms, and a green garden in front of it. My mom always take care of this house. I think it's right that our house is our palace because we can do what we want no matter what. Two years ago, I almost moved to the other house because there was an accident, and sssttt I can't tell you, because it's secret. So I think that's all
